title: Land with solidly built house for sale
details:
The perfect location to build your dream home in a highly residential area. Marvelous surrounding with a lot of greenery around you.

This land consist of 13 perches with a solid house which could be used with modifications. Suitable location for you to enjoy natures essence also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to both Havelock road and D S Fonseka road. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and all your needs within close range.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
